content:
I have some old lean4 code where theorem Implies.trans {p q r : Prop} (h₁ : p → q) (h₂ : q → r) : p → r was a thing but now its not.

I was looking for a similar thing in mathlib but couldn't find anything.

I could define my own theorem to use, but I'm curious if this is available in mathlib

ah, implications are functions so function composition.

Alright.
Jad Abou Hawili has marked this topic as resolved.
